This is a tool to help process/filter/search logs

Somewhat specific to MD, but should work with other mods May be a bit laggy and RAM-consuming depending on log size

How to use:

  • Download archive
  • Unpack it
  • Install .net 6.0 runtime https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download/dotnet/6.0
  • Check readme file
  • Use exe file

CrocsLoggerTool.zip
